body.p: Update linker script, updateLinkerScripts.pl, is responsible for creating the linker script table () used by the overlay manager and GDB. This table is populated based upon the configuration and is updated with new mapping entries at runtime.

This table shows a mostly accurate depiction of how overlay sections are mapped to processor and DDR memory. The Xtensa managers differs from that diagram in that there are no longer any rodata sections saved to D-RAM nor stored in DDR.
